kv1.5:1.3: Accantaṃ jahati, anavasesaṃ jahati, appaṭisandhiyaṃ jahati, samūlaṃ jahati, sataṇhaṃ jahati, sānusayaṃ jahati, ariyena ñāṇena jahati, ariyena maggena jahati, akuppaṃ paṭivijjhanto jahati, anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikaronto jahatīti?
kv1.5:2.3: Accantaṃ vikkhambheti, anavasesaṃ vikkhambheti, appaṭisandhiyaṃ vikkhambheti, samūlaṃ vikkhambheti, sataṇhaṃ vikkhambheti, sānusayaṃ vikkhambheti, ariyena ñāṇena vikkhambheti, ariyena maggena vikkhambheti, akuppaṃ paṭivijjhanto vikkhambheti, anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikaronto vikkhambhetīti?
kv1.5:3.1: ☑ Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca accantaṃ jahati, anavasesaṃ jahati …pe…
kv1.5:3.4: Jahati puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca accantaṃ jahati, anavasesaṃ jahati …pe…
kv1.5:4.1: ☑ Vikkhambheti anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca accantaṃ vikkhambheti, anavasesaṃ vikkhambheti …pe…
kv1.5:4.4: Vikkhambheti puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca accantaṃ vikkhambheti, anavasesaṃ vikkhambheti …pe…
kv1.5:5.1: ☑ Jahati puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca na accantaṃ jahati, na anavasesaṃ jahati …pe…
kv1.5:5.4: Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca na accantaṃ jahati …pe…
kv1.5:6.1: ☑ Vikkhambheti puthujjano kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca na accantaṃ vikkhambheti, na anavasesaṃ vikkhambheti …pe…
kv1.5:6.4: Vikkhambheti anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca na accantaṃ vikkhambheti, na anavasesaṃ vikkhambheti …pe…
kv1.5:7.5: Rūpāvacaro maggo niyyāniko khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavo asaṃyojaniyo aganthaniyo anoghaniyo ayoganiyo anīvaraṇiyo aparāmaṭṭho anupādāniyo asaṃkilesiyoti?
kv1.5:7.7: Nanu rūpāvacaro maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī na bodhagāmī na apacayagāmī sāsavo saṃyojaniyo …pe… saṃkilesiyoti?
kv1.5:7.9: Hañci rūpāvacaro maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī …pe…
kv1.5:7.10: saṃkilesiyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.5:8.1: ☑ Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca maggo niyyāniko khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavo …pe…
kv1.5:8.4: Jahati puthujjano rūpāvacarena maggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca maggo niyyāniko khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavo …pe…
kv1.5:9.1: ☑ Jahati puthujjano rūpāvacarena maggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī na bodhagāmī na apacayagāmī sāsavo …pe…
kv1.5:9.4: Jahati anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo anāgāmimaggena kāmarāgabyāpādaṃ, so ca maggo aniyyāniko na khayagāmī na bodhagāmī na apacayagāmī sāsavo …pe…
kv1.5:10.1: ☑ Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:11.1: ☑ Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:13.3: Tiṇṇaṃ phassānaṃ tissannaṃ vedanānaṃ tissannaṃ saññānaṃ tissannaṃ cetanānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cittānaṃ tissannaṃ saddhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vīriyānaṃ tissannaṃ satīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādhīnaṃ tissannaṃ paññānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti?
kv1.5:14.1: ☑ Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:16.3: Nanu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā sotāpattiphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatāti?
kv1.5:16.5: Hañci tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānā sotāpattiphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.5:16.7: Anāgāmimaggena oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ jahatīti?
kv1.5:17.1: ☑ Anāgāmimaggena oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ jahatīti?
kv1.5:17.3: Nanu kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatāti?
kv1.5:17.5: Hañci kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.5:18.1: ☑ Puthujjano kāmesu vītarāgo saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhātīti?
kv1.5:18.3: Ye keci dhammaṃ abhisamenti, sabbe te saha dhammābhisamayā anāgāmiphale saṇṭhahantīti?
kv1.5:24.4: “so hi nāma, bhikkhave, sunetto satthā evaṃ dīghāyuko samāno evaṃ ciraṭṭhitiko aparimutto ahosi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi aparimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
kv1.5:24.8: Ariyassa sīlassa ananubodhā appaṭivedhā, ariyassa samādhissa, ariyāya paññāya, ariyāya vimuttiyā ananubodhā appaṭivedhā.
kv1.5:24.9: Tayidaṃ, bhikkhave, ariyaṃ sīlaṃ anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, ariyo samādhi anubuddho paṭividdho, ariyā paññā anubuddhā paṭividdhā, ariyā vimutti anubuddhā paṭividdhā, ucchinnā bhavataṇhā, khīṇā bhavanetti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
